name: PredictLeads
headline: Best in class company intelligence data.
description: PredictLeads provides structured data on companies. Using our data Sales teams can discover companies in their buy mode, Quant funds know when to perform trades and VCs can predict when a startup will be raising a new round. PredictLeads cuts down their market research time. Our goal is to structure the sea of public information on companies.

#  Your Source of Company Intelligence Data 
Structured company intelligence data powering your business via APIs, Flat Files and Webhooks. 
Company signals help you identify growing companies, understand target prospects and improve outreach personalization. 
[Sign Up and get 100 FREE API requests/month → ](https://predictleads.com/</sign_up>)
  * [ **High Definition Vehicle Insurance** received financingof**$40M** in**funding** on**Feb 12th '25**. ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/www.freightwaves.com/news/hdvi-secures-40m-for-data-driven-trucking-insurance>)
  * [ **Nike Inc** will open new locationin**Luxembourg, Luxembourg** on**Nov 5th '25**. ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/delano.lu/article/nike-opens-first-shop-in-luxembourg-at-the-cloche-dor>)
  * [ **Revel** received financingof**$60M** in**loan** on**Feb 10th '25**. ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/evmagz.com/revel-secures-60m-loan-to-expand-nyc-ev-charging-network>)
  * [ **Rockefeller & Co.** will receive financingof**$1B** on**Feb 21st '25**. ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/www.advisorhub.com/rockefeller-nabs-billion-dollar-stifel-team-in-new-york-city>)

##  Companies We Work With 
![Dealroom](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/dealroom-CRG3Blws.png) ![Clay](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/clay-Bc1GM2rc.png) ![FactSet](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/factset-B1CQFggM.png)
> As a software powered investment firm, having a breath of data is crucial for InReach Ventures. PredictLeads's data and APIs help us discover early-stage startups from all across Europe. 
Ben Smith 
Co-Founder / CTO at InReach Ventures 
![Ben Smith
](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/ben-inreach-ventures-67kZHl8b.png)
> We've run personalized campaigns based off of PredictLead's job opening and product launch signals. Working with their API is a breeze, and the support from the team has been incredible! 
Alex Millet 
Product Manager at Segment 
![Alex Millet
](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/alex-millet-segment-88g5NdZE.png)
> Using PredictLeads data our sales development team is able to prequalify leads 3 times faster. The number of appointments we are setting every week is up significantly. 
Martin Weiss 
Sales Principal at BizXpand 
![Martin Weiss
](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/martin-weiss-bizxpand-Cbsrkw5P.png)
> PredictLeads data is of value to our scouting activities as it spots targets in the market we were not aware of before. 
Raymond Custers 
Investment Specialist Rabo Frontier Ventures at Rabobank 
![Raymond Custers
](https://predictleads.com/vite/assets/raymond-custers-rabobank-3F7wyZLG.png)
##  Enrich Company Data 
Get signals like hiring intent, new customers signed, technologies used, product launches, location expansions, awards received and many others for your B2B solution. 
[Check Documentation → ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/docs.predictleads.com/v3>)
##  Discover Net-New Companies 
Use filters like job openings, investment activities, companies working with competitors and others to identify growing companies that should be on your radar. 
[Sign Up and get 100 FREE API requests/month → ](https://predictleads.com/</sign_up>)
##  Our Datasets 
##  Job Openings 
Structured Job Posting data on more than 1.6M companies enabling you to identify investment initiatives and future company aspirations. 
##  News Events 
Using machine learning we detect 29 different events from news and structure them so they are prepared for further analysis and ingestion. 
##  Technographics 
Identify companies adopting or dropping specific technologies. 
##  Key Customer Data 
Better understand supply chain relationships and track newly added key customers. 
[Talk to a Data Consultant ](https://predictleads.com/<#contact>)
## 
Install TalkingPoints Chrome Extension and have Company Events Always at Your Fingertips 
[Install Chrome Extension → ](https://predictleads.com/<https:/chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/talkingpoints-extension/cllcfnlpahekfiplbnepiaaepmcpgljc>)

generated_description:
**PredictLeads** is a company that specializes in delivering structured company intelligence data, designed to empower businesses with insights that can significantly enhance their decision-making processes. Founded in 2018 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S19, PredictLeads is based in Ljubljana, Slovenia, and boasts a dedicated team of 24 employees.

The company’s mission is to provide best-in-class company intelligence data, allowing sales teams to discover companies poised to make purchases, enabling quantitative funds to time their trades effectively, and assisting venture capitalists in predicting when startups will seek new funding rounds. Essentially, PredictLeads takes the ocean of publicly available data about companies and structures it, making it more accessible and actionable, thus shortening the market research time dramatically.

Their services leverage machine learning to extract meaningful signals from a variety of sources, helping users to identify growing companies, understand their target markets, and personalize outreach strategies. Customers can access this information through APIs, flat files, and webhooks, making integration seamless for businesses of all sizes. 

The PredictLeads platform is known for its capabilities, including monitoring job openings, tracking company investments, and observing technological shifts within firms. By offering insights like hiring intent and customer acquisitions, users can stay ahead of market trends and identify potential leads more effectively.

With a commitment to empowering organizations through data, PredictLeads provides a free tier that allows new users to test the platform with 100 free API requests each month. This enables businesses to explore how structured data can enhance their operations without upfront investment.

Curious to learn more? Feel free to check out their website at [predictleads.com](https://predictleads.com).
